install.name: mod_rsg2scroller
install.author: Daniel Tulp and Radek Kafka
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/ GPL license
install.description:
!!! prepared but not ready !!!
RSGallery2 Thumbnail Scroller Scrolls selected thumbnails from the RSGallery2 component for Joomla!. Note: This module uses the proprietary tag marquee, therefore not valid.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: useACL
param.label: Use ACL
param.description: Do you want the module to check if people have access rights to the galleries of the thumbnails (only works when ACL is enabled)?

param.name: usegalselect
param.label: Limit to certain galleries
param.description: Do you want limit the thumbnails displayed to certain galleries?

param.name: galselect
param.label: Gallery id's
param.description: Enter one or more gallery id's seperated by a comma: 5,6,10.

param.name: ScrollAmount
param.label: Scroll Amount
param.description: Number of pixels to scroll at each step. Default is 2.

param.name: ScrollDelay
param.label: Scroll Delay
param.description: Number of ms to wait between steps. Default is 50.

param.name: link2gal
param.label: Gallery or display
param.description: Link to the gallery or to the display view (the actual image).

param.name: Width
param.label: Scroll Width
param.description: Default is 100%, ajust when you want it to be smaller/ larger then that.

param.name: widthunit
param.label: Width unit
param.description: Width in pixels or a percentage

param.name: heightunit
param.label: Height unit
param.description: Height in pixels or a percentage

param.name: usecss
param.label: Use CSS entered below?
param.description: Do you want the module to use the CSS entered below? Note: It is not valid to use css outside the head, you can also add the css below to your own css stylesheet, then again, the marquee tag (used by this module to scroll) is also not valid.

param.name: css
param.label: CSS
param.description: Edit CSS to be included in the script here. Note: don't use return, simply type everything on the same line.
